title: Rose Varieties Quiz
description: The queen of flowers! Test your knowledge of rose types, famous varieties, and rose gardening traditions.

questions.question: Which type of rose grows in clusters of multiple blooms on each stem rather than a single flower?
What is the most popular and classic type of rose, known for one perfect bloom per long stem?
Which famous rose breeder created the 'Peace' rose, one of the most popular roses of the 20th century?
David Austin roses are famous for combining what two qualities?
options: Old-fashioned flower form with modern repeat blooming

questions.question: What color rose traditionally symbolizes friendship?
Which type of rose naturally has only five petals and resembles a wild rose?
What is the term for the swollen area at the base of a grafted rose where the rootstock meets the top variety?
Which rose is known as the "Damask Rose" and has been grown for centuries for rose oil and perfume?
What is the fruit of a rose plant called, often used to make tea or jam?
Which tough, disease-resistant rose type has wrinkled leaves and is excellent for hedges?
The "Knock Out" rose series became hugely popular for what reason?
options: Exceptional disease resistance and easy care

questions.question: In the War of the Roses, the House of Lancaster was represented by which color rose?
What is the process called when you remove spent rose blooms to encourage more flowers?
Which country is the world's largest producer of rose oil for the perfume industry?
What color roses do NOT naturally occur and must be created through dyeing or genetic modification?
